feat_1_desc: When the internet goes down, TapAlert steps up. Send critical alerts via 4G/5G cellular networks using Direct SMS, ensuring your message gets through even during network outages, natural disasters, or in areas with poor data coverage.
feat_2_desc: If enabled, your real-time GPS coordinates are automatically embedded in every alert message. Help your emergency contacts find you faster with pinpoint accuracy.
feat_3_desc: Not just text. TapAlert can surreptitiously record a 10s audio clip of your surroundings and include it in your alert, providing crucial context to your emergency contacts.
feat_4_desc: Why rely on one method? Configure primary and failback options: Direct SMS, Twilio integration (for data-only situations or SIM failure), and Email fallbacks. If one fails, TapAlert automatically tries the next.
feat_5_desc: Launch an alert your way. Map TapAlert to your Android Quick Settings tile, or long-press the app icon for a permanent launcher shortcut to trigger an SOS.
feat_6_desc: Designed with a massive, high-contrast SOS button. Fully compatible with screen readers (TalkBack/VoiceOver), respects system text scaling, and requires zero technical knowledge to operate once set up. See the Accessiblity Guide.

hero_designed_for_1: Designed with seniors in mind: simple, secure, no monthly fees.
hero_designed_for_2: Friction-less (remotely assisted) initial configuration for seniors.
hero_for_family: For your parents, grandparents, and older adults.
hero_personal_safety: Personal safety alert tool designed for seniors, families, travelers, and anyone who wants a fast way to notify trusted contacts when something isn’t right — without subscriptions, accounts, or tracking.
hero_world_quote: In a world where the unexpected is the new normal—from sudden floods to power outages—ensure you are never truly alone. With one tap, let your loved ones know you are safe or need a helping hand, no matter what the day brings.
hero_sms_text: Our app sends alerts via SMS, not data-based messaging — so your message gets through when apps, Wi-Fi, and push notifications don’t. Whether your recipients have smartphones, feature phones, or limited connectivity, SMS delivers.
section_features_subtitle: Everything you need to stay connected with your emergency contacts, designed for simplicity and reliability.
section_screenshots_subtitle: Intuitive interface designed for speed and simplicity
section_platform_summary: Summary: What Each Platform Can Do
feat_senior_voice: Voice-to-text so users don’t need to type
feat_senior_countdown: Configurable Countdown timer or Hold-to-send confirmation prevents accidental alerts
feat_senior_clarity: All UI decisions prioritize clarity and simplicity over feature density
feat_senior_magic: Zero friction configuration with magic link that can be sent via WhatsApp, SMS, Email, etc. With a single click your senior can configure the app and start using it.
feat_senior_flash: Screen flash — 3 bright flashes confirm every alert, so users with hearing loss never miss it
feat_senior_tone: Lower-frequency tones — default alert sounds at 500–600 Hz, easier to hear for age-related hearing loss
feat_senior_haptic: Haptic countdown — phone pulses once per second during the countdown, no need to look at the screen
feat_sos_desc: Send predefined SOS “I need help!” or “I’m okay” messages instantly with one tap. Messages include your precise GPS location and address.
feat_delivery_desc: Works offline with Direct SMS. Automatic fallback between cellular and Wi-Fi to ensure your message gets through.
feat_timer_desc: Set a countdown timer. If you don’t check in on time, an automatic alert is sent to your contacts. Perfect for solo activities.
feat_voice_desc: Create messages hands-free using voice input. Helpful in stressful or limited-mobility situations when typing isn’t possible.
feat_seniors_desc: Large text, high contrast, tunable sound pitch for hearing impaired, and a clear, distraction-free interface. Easy for seniors and non-technical users.
feat_family_desc: Family members can help seniors set up the app and contacts remotely using a configuration link. Configure the app on your own device and send them the link to install and configure the app with just one click.
feat_location_ctx_desc: Includes both precise GPS coordinates and human-readable street address. Works even if recipients are offline or using basic phones.
feat_email_desc: Can send E-mail alerts as a reinforcement messaging method or to provide alerts redundancy if Twilio is not available.
feat_modes_desc: Panic (main screen) for quick and simple SOS or I’m OK alerts and Reporting (swipe left) to allow better alert customization with pre-configured messages for non emergency situations.
page_title: TapAlert - Simple Emergency Alerts. No Monthly Fees.
phil_priv_no_accounts_desc: the app works entirely locally, no sign-up or login
phil_priv_no_tracking_desc: no user behavior data is collected or transmitted
phil_priv_no_ads_desc: the app is ad-free, monetized only through a one-time in-app purchase for premium features
phil_priv_no_subs_desc: users pay once (or not at all for the free tier), no recurring fees
phil_location_access: Location is only accessed when sending an alert
phil_sms_over_data: The app prioritizes SMS over data-based messaging (push notifications, WhatsApp, etc.) because:
phil_sms_li_wifi: SMS works when internet/Wi-Fi is down (cell towers have battery backup)
phil_sms_li_nosmartphone: Recipients don't need smartphones — feature phones and basic phones receive SMS
phil_sms_li_carrier: SMS is carrier-level delivery, not dependent on third-party servers being online
phil_red_full: When no cellular service is available, the app falls back to sending SMS first via Wi-Fi Calling (if available, phone/provider dependent) or, if not, via Twilio (if configured). This provides a secondary delivery path when the primary SMS channel is unavailable. Likewise, in a situation with only cellular service (no Wi-Fi and no internet), if the Direct SMS fails for some reason (defective or no SIM,...), Twilio (if configured) will act as failback, as it can also use the cellular network (via 4G/5G) to send the message as a last resort.
phil_sos_ok_buttons: Large, high-contrast buttons (Single SOS and I'm OK)
feat_twilio_android_p: the app sends SMS directly from your phone, no Twilio needed but is recommended. Twilio is optional, used as Wi-Fi backup when cellular is unavailable or broken — but it can also be used as failback in cellular-only situations if your Direct SMS does not work or is not available.
feat_twilio_iphone_p: Apple blocks apps from sending SMS directly. This is an Apple restriction, not a TapAlert limitation. Twilio is the bridge that lets the app send SMS automatically on your behalf. Without it, the only option is manually tapping "Send" again in the Messages app — not ideal in an emergency.
feat_widget_desc: Add a one-tap emergency widget to your home screen for instant access without opening the app. Instructions for using it with a physical button or gesture are also provided in the app.

uc_adventurers_desc: Hikers or cyclists who want a reliable way to send their location to family at the start/end of a trail or in case of emergency.
uc_personal_desc: Walking home late at night or using ride-shares? Send a discreet "Watch my back" alert to friends and family.

notice_disclaimer: Message delivery depends on network availability and recipient action. This app does not provide monitoring, emergency response, or guaranteed delivery. In real emergencies, always contact emergency services directly.
qs_step3_p1_new: Verify if Wifi calls are enabled on your phone. If your carrier doesn't support it, consider using a Twilio account as a fallback for Wifi-only situations. Twilio is free to start and provides reliable SMS delivery without a cell signal.
qs_step3_p2_new: You can also enable Email redundancy in TapAlert to ensure your loved ones are notified via multiple channels.
qs_step5_p: Swipe Left to access your preconfigured custom messages for specific situations. Swipe Right to activate the Check-in Timer (Dead Man's Switch), which auto-alerts if you don't check in by a certain time.
qs_step6_p: If you’re setting this phone up for someone else (like a senior relative), take a moment to preconfigure their custom alerts (Swipe Left) so they have the most relevant messages ready at their fingertips.
